context:
### Idiom: 抱薪救火
### Meaning: 薪柴草。抱着柴草去救火。比喻用错误的方法去消除灾祸，结果使灾祸反而扩大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 大家都只看到违约，却没看到上至高管下至主管纷纷又提了一套京沪豪宅抱薪救火啊。
target: Everyone only sees the breach of contract, but they didn't notice that everyone from senior executives to managers have again invested in luxury houses in Beijing and Shanghai to save themselves from the crisis.

context:
### Idiom: 一呵而就
### Meaning: 一口气完成。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 借窍，跟北方农村经常举行的“跳大神”差不多，也由天才负责操作，自称某某神仙附体，说一番也是事先已经通过暗中查摸而知晓了的内容。按照“一贯道”的规矩，担任天、地、人“三才”角色的，一般都是从10岁出头的儿童开始，因为这么一个小小人儿能够操纵乩笔在沙盘上书写诗词，还能将别人的心事用四六句半文半白行文不打半点噎顿地一呵而就，对于不知情的人来说，显然不得不啧啧称奇，然后就会相信那是得了神助之故。按照“一贯道”的规矩，担任天、地、人“三才”角色的，一般都是从10岁出头的儿童开始，因为这么一个小小人儿能够操纵乩笔在沙盘上书写诗词，还能将别人的心事用四六句半文半白行文不打半点噎顿地一呵而就，对于不知情的人来说，显然不得不啧啧称奇，然后就会相信那是得了神助之故。
target: Translate the following text into English: It is similar to the "jumping of the gods" often held in northern rural areas, and is also operated by geniuses, claiming to be possessed by some immortal god, and speaking about something that has already been known through secret investigations in advance. According to the rules of "Yiguan Dao", those who assume the roles of "Heaven, Earth, and Human" (San Cai) generally start from children in their early teens, because such a small child can manipulate the divining stick to write poetry on a sand table, and can also express the thoughts and feelings of others in four-six lines of semi-colloquial Chinese without any stuttering, which makes those who are unaware obviously have to marvel and then believe it is due to divine assistance. According to the rules of "Yiguan Dao", those who assume the roles of "Heaven, Earth, and Human" (San Cai) generally start from children in their early teens, because such a small child can manipulate the divining stick to write poetry on a sand table, and can also express the thoughts and feelings of others in four-six lines of semi-colloquial Chinese without any stuttering, which makes those who are unaware obviously have to marvel and then believe it is due to divine assistance.

context:
### Idiom: 身外之物
### Meaning: 个人身体以外的东西，指名誉、地位、财产等。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 但知情的人都知道老法师一生持戒精严，坚持：不管人、不管钱、不管事。有道场想印经，老法师也是教导学生不许出去化缘，也不许设立功德箱，法师开示：若有人主动提到想印经布施才能接受捐款，学佛人不能造成别人压力，更不能增长自己贪心，这些身外之物都不能执著。老法师常提起自己的老师章嘉大师所教导的学佛的入门：“看得破、放得下。
target: But those who know, know that the old monk strictly observed precepts throughout his life, insisting: no matter the person, no matter the money, no matter the matter. If there was a temple wanting to print sutras, the old monk would also instruct his students not to go out and beg for alms, nor to set up a merit box. The monk taught: only if someone voluntarily mentions wanting to donate for sutra printing can donations be accepted. Buddhists should not put pressure on others, and should not increase their own greed. These external things should not be clung to. The old monk often mentioned the teachings of his teacher, Master Zhangjia, on the entry point to learning Buddhism: "See through, let go."

context:
### Idiom: 连篇累牍
### Meaning: 形容篇幅多，文辞长。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 各地方政府态度不一，有反对、有支持、也有沉默。反党反社会主义分子煽动新闻界，进行错误的舆论导向，使得中国媒体报道非常热烈，不少媒体予以支持，进行连篇累牍甚至言过其实的报道；人民日报、新华社等记者甚至加入游行，一些报纸因而被查封。。随著六四武力清场，各地学运戛然而止。
target: The attitudes of local governments vary, with some opposing, some supporting, and some remaining silent. Anti-party and anti-socialist elements incited the press and conducted erroneous public opinion guidance, which caused the Chinese media to report very enthusiastically. Many media supported it and carried out lengthy and even exaggerated reports; reporters from the People's Daily and Xinhua News Agency even joined the march, and some newspapers therefore Seized. . With the violent clearing of the Tiananmen Square massacre, the student movement in various places came to an abrupt end.

context:
### Idiom: 以其昏昏，使人昭昭
### Meaning: 昏昏凝，糊涂；昭昭明白。指自己还糊里糊涂，却要去教别人明白事理。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 1965年1月29日，毛泽东肯定了陈正人这种深入工人群众参加生产劳动实践的做法，并在这个报告上作了指示：“如果管理人员不到车间小组搞‘三同’，拜老师学一门至几门手艺，那就一辈子会同工人阶级处于尖锐的斗争状态中，最后也必然要被工人阶级把他们当作资产阶级打倒。不学会技术，长期当外行，管理也搞不好，以其昏昏，使人昭昭，是不行的。”1966年2月5日，正是立春后的第一天，湖北省委向中央报告了关于逐步实现农业机械化的设想，引起毛泽东的高度重视，并在这份报告上作了批示。
target: On January 29, 1965, Mao Zedong affirmed Chen Zhengren’s approach of going deep into the masses of workers to participate in production and labor practice, and gave instructions in this report: “If the managers do not engage in the ‘three sames’ in the workshop group, they should learn from the teacher. If you have one or a few crafts, you will be in a state of sharp struggle with the working class throughout your life, and in the end you will inevitably be overthrown by the working class as a bourgeoisie. If you don’t learn technology, you will be a layman for a long time, and your management will not be good, and you will suffer. It will not work if you are in a daze and make people aware." On February 5, 1966, the first day after the beginning of spring, the Hubei Provincial Party Committee reported to the Central Committee the idea of gradually realizing agricultural mechanization, which attracted Mao Zedong's great attention. and made comments on this report.

context:
### Idiom: 别创一格
### Meaning: 指开创一种新的风格或形式。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 《三国志》是三国时代结束后不久，由3世纪末历史学家陈寿所著之中国历代史实。体例属纪传体的分国史，又无表、志，在断代史中别创一格。三国志记载中国三国时代历史的断代史，同时也是二十四史中评价最高的“前四史”之一。
target: 《Three Kingdoms Chronicle》 is a chronicle of the Three Kingdoms, which was written by Chen Shou, a historian of the late 3rd century, and is a Chinese history of the past dynasties. The chronicle is of the biography-history style, which is a chronicle of the history of the three kingdoms. At the same time, it is also one of the four most highly rated "pre-history" books in the Twenty-four Histories.

context:
### Idiom: 如兄如弟
### Meaning: 情如兄弟。比喻彼此感情好，关系密切。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 阿超年过不惑遇事却经常大惑，儿子还经常以老道的口吻说：对无力解决的事别执著，要多想快乐的事。唯一让阿超伤心的，大概就是交了女朋友还得经由老师通知，都说女儿是妈妈的小棉袄，我认为最佳的父子关系应该如兄如弟，对儿子的不讲义气，阿超也只能抬头边看边想：天要下雨。感情再好的父子也难免有争执，每当阿超自豪说：我写字都30多年了！儿子就立刻一盆冷水慢浇：写了30多年，成果在甚么地方？
target: A-Chao, despite being over forty and supposedly beyond confusion, often finds himself perplexed by life's challenges. His son often advises him in a wise tone: don't obsess over things you can't solve, try to think more about happy things. The only thing that saddens A-Chao is having to learn about his son's girlfriend through his teacher. People say that a daughter is like a mother's little cotton-padded jacket, but I believe the best father-son relationship should be like brothers. Despite his son's lack of loyalty, A-Chao can only look up and think: it's going to rain. Even the best father-son relationships can't avoid disagreements. Whenever A-Chao proudly says: I've been writing for over 30 years! His son immediately pours cold water on his enthusiasm by asking: you've been writing for over 30 years, where are the results?

context:
### Idiom: 胸中万卷
### Meaning: 指读过大量的书。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 心有花满枝，漫眼尽红绯。胸中万卷图，落笔皆山河。回家时候看到杏花几乎全变得苍白——这是花要尽了。
target: The heart is full of flowers, and the eyes are filled with crimson red. There are thousands of pictures in the chest, and every stroke of the pen is a landscape. When I returned home, I saw that the apricot blossoms had almost all turned pale - this is a sign that the flowers are about to wither.

context:
### Idiom: 连篇累牍
### Meaning: 形容篇幅多，文辞长。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 但在政治站位上，《银行周报》的立场较为复杂，一面号召同业抵制北洋政府债券，另一方面却又认为国民政府摊销债券“用途得当，信用巩固”，但到了国民政府发债太多、侵害利益时又啧有烦言。1927年蒋中正上台后，《银行周报》对共产党组织罢工的反对文章连篇累牍，认为应该保护国货以满足工人需求，但在五卅运动抵制日货时却又表现悲观。《银行周报》总编徐沧水认为，虽然《银行周报》创办伊始银行公会尚未成立，但《银行周报》已经成为了各家银行的共同事业，为上海银行公会的最终成立奠定了基础。
target: However, in terms of political stance, the position of "Banking Weekly" is rather complex. On one hand, it called on its peers to boycott the bonds of the Beiyang Government, but on the other hand, it believed that the bonds issued by the Nationalist Government were "appropriately used and creditworthy". But when the Nationalist Government issued too many bonds and harmed interests, it showed annoyance. After Chiang Kai-shek came to power in 1927, "Banking Weekly" published a series of articles opposing the Communist Party's organization of strikes, arguing that domestic products should be protected to meet workers' needs. However, it showed pessimism during the May 30th Movement's boycott of Japanese goods. Xu Cangshui, the editor-in-chief of "Banking Weekly", believed that although the Banking Association had not yet been established at the beginning of the establishment of "Banking Weekly", "Banking Weekly" has become a common cause of various banks and laid the foundation for the final establishment of the Shanghai Banking Association.

context:
### Idiom: 油嘴滑舌
### Meaning: 形容说话油滑，耍嘴皮子。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: “好巧啊，你也在这里啊”一道清脆如银铃的身影传来。施逸笑了笑：“我可没有油嘴滑舌，只是实话实说罢了”。她一身简单的休闲穿着，脸上并无粉黛，但随意一站便是一道靓丽风景。
target: “It's funny, you're here too,” the clear, bell-like voice said. Xi Shiyi smiled: “I'm not saying anything out of turn, I'm just speaking the truth”. She was wearing a simple casual outfit and her face was unadorned, but she was a beautiful sight wherever she stood.

context:
### Idiom: 身外之物
### Meaning: 个人身体以外的东西，指名誉、地位、财产等。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 学生们都深怕自己没有遵循好法师的教诲：“对一切人事物没有占有、控制，你就自在了。”“身体自己就控制不了，你还能控制身外之物吗？”老法师长期只吃一餐，教导学生们学佛人应有的行谊。
target: The students are all afraid that they have not followed the teachings of the good monk: "You will be at ease if you don't possess or control anything." "If you can't control your own body, can you control the things outside your body?" The old monk has only eaten one meal for a long time, teaching the students to learn the conduct of Buddhists.

context:
### Idiom: 捏一把汗
### Meaning: 因担心而手上出汗。形容非常紧张的心情。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 在最新的剧情中，飞行医疗部主任陆振辉因一时决策失误接治了私人医院的病危患者，因患者病因不明在转院途中抢救无效而死亡。危机时刻，公关关系部主任徐海鸥变身硬核女斗士，头戴安全帽，踩着细高跟鞋单枪匹马的来回奔波于施工工地、急诊病房，争分夺秒的成功化解了两起同时爆发的医疗公关危机事件，着实让人捏一把汗。
target: In the latest storyline, Flight Director of Medical Services, Lu Zhenhui, made a momentary decision mistake when accepting the critically ill patient from a private hospital. Due to the unknown cause of the patient's illness, despite attempts at resuscitation during the transfer, the patient passed away. In a crisis, Public Relations Director Xu Haiou transforms into a tough female warrior, wearing a hard hat and high-heeled shoes, bravely traveling alone between construction sites, emergency wards, and emergency rooms. By racing against time, she successfully defuses two simultaneous medical public relations crises, causing people to hold their breath in concern.

context:
### Idiom: 有教无类
### Meaning: 类：类别。不管什么人都可以受到教育。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 会否自立门户签新人？坤哥说：‘不会了，都未管理好自己，宁愿将毕生功力传授开去，作育英才，开始有些同事蔡洁、江嘉敏都提出来上课。’他笑言专收‘魔音’学生，知道无线蕴藏好多‘魔音’，包括李佳芯、冯盈盈、郭柏妍等，好欢迎教她们唱歌，‘有教无类，唱歌最紧要基本技巧和感情，我唱了10几年，有些经验和心得，只要大家肯学就得，会努力将不可能变有可能，证明自己实力’。爱雀受欢迎 Toby启发商机。
target: Will he sign new recruits on his own? Brother Kun said: "No, I haven't managed myself well. I would rather pass on my lifelong skills and cultivate talents. At first, some colleagues Cai Jie and Jiang Jiamin proposed to take classes." He said with a smile that he specializes in recruiting students with "magic voices". He knows that Wireless has many "magic voices", including Li Jiaxin, Feng Yingying, Guo Baiyan, etc., so he welcomes them to teach them singing. I have been singing for more than 10 years, and I have some experience and insights. As long as everyone is willing to learn, they will work hard to make the impossible possible and prove their own strength.' The popularity of Toby inspires business opportunities.

context:
### Idiom: 驰名天下
### Meaning: 驰传扬。形容名声传播得很远。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 至于999.9和Mr.Gentleman EYEWEAR同是山目的重点主打作，前者的逆R铰链设计驰名天下，铰链采用钛合金制造，并拉长了镜腿和桩头之间的距离，从而让舒适性大大提高。至于Mr.Gentleman EYEWEAR则以汇合百家所长见称，作品交由福井县樱市顶尖眼镜工厂制造，却又每每注入欧美风设计元素，例如线条优雅皇冠形鼻托及金字塔形锅钉，都是其特色设计。
target: As for 999.9 and Mr.Gentleman EYEWEAR, they are both the key products of Yamane. The former is renowned worldwide for its unique reverse R hinge design. The hinge is made of titanium alloy, and the distance between the temple and the hinge has been extended, greatly improving comfort. As for Mr.Gentleman EYEWEAR, it is known for its combination of the strengths of various designers. The products are made by top eyewear factories in Sakurashi, Fukui Prefecture, but they often incorporate elements of European and American design, such as the elegant crown-shaped nose pads and pyramid-shaped rivets, which are their signature designs.

context:
### Idiom: 各取所长
### Meaning: 指要善于运用事物或人本身所具有的长处。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 劳工骑士团是一个对所有工人开放的多元化劳工组织。领导们觉得招募各种背景的成员才能各取所长。成员包括低技能工人、铁路工人、移民和钢铁工人，但是禁止五类人加入：银行家、土地投机者、律师、酒商、赌徒。
target: The Labor Knights is a diverse labor organization open to all workers. Leaders believe that recruiting members from various backgrounds can harness their strengths. Members include low-skilled workers, railroad workers, immigrants, and steel workers, but five types of people are banned from joining: bankers, land speculators, lawyers, wine merchants, and gamblers.

context:
### Idiom: 斑斑点点
### Meaning: 物体的表面颜色不纯净，颜色杂乱或凹凸不平。

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 有时是坚硬，冰冷和复杂的。有时它在脑中建造出宇宙的模型；斑斑点点的能量穿越广阔空旷的空间。有时它称呼这些斑点为“电子”和“质子”。
target: It can be hard, cold and complex. It can build models of the universe in the mind; tiny bursts of energy traversing the vast spaces. It can call these bursts "electrons" and "protons."

context:
### Idiom: 身外之物
### Meaning: 个人身体以外的东西，指名誉、地位、财产等。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 学生们都深怕自己没有遵循好法师的教诲：“对一切人事物没有占有、控制，你就自在了。”“身体自己就控制不了，你还能控制身外之物吗？”老法师长期只吃一餐，教导学生们学佛人应有的行谊。
target: The students were deeply afraid that they had not followed the master's teachings: "If you do not possess or control everything and everyone, you will be free." "You can't even control your own body, how can you control things outside it?" The old master only ate one meal a day for a long time, teaching his students the conduct that a Buddhist should have.

context:
### Idiom: 弃明投暗
### Meaning: 指抛弃光明的、正确的，投向黑暗的、错误的道路。与弃暗投明”意相反，亦作背明投暗”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 宝宝们！出来卖是你们的命！夜场是你们的姓！希望你们速速投降！弃明投暗！早日从恶！#3号夜场 房间69#。
target: Kids! Come out and sell your life! Night club is your name! I hope you quickly surrender! Pass the light to the dark! Early in the day! 3rd Night Club room 69#.

context:
### Idiom: 金榜挂名
### Meaning: 指科举得中。同金榜题名”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: #微博之夜#微博之夜，洞房花烛夜，金榜挂名时的感觉吧？。
target: #Weibo Night# The feeling of Weibo Night, wedding night, and the moment of hanging your name on the Golden List?

context:
### Idiom: 气吞山河
### Meaning: 气势可以吞掉高山和大河。形容气魄很大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 为什么这样说，我们从“中华民族伟大复兴”的字面上就可感受到如下几层意思：首先，我们曾经兴旺发达过，曾经辉煌过，这是指古代我们确曾创造出灿烂的农耕文明，走在人类历史的前列，为人类文明做出过重大贡献。尤其是中国共产党成立之后，义无反顾肩负起实现中华民族伟大复兴的历史使命，团结带领人民进行了艰苦卓绝的斗争，谱写了气吞山河的壮丽史诗。其次，我们衰落过，沉沦过，这是特指的近代。
target: Why do we say this? We can perceive several layers of meaning from the phrase "the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation". Firstly, we were once prosperous and glorious. This refers to the fact that in ancient times, we indeed created a brilliant agricultural civilization, leading the way in human history and making significant contributions to human civilization. Especially after the establishment of the Communist Party of China, it took up the historical mission of realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation without hesitation, united and led the people in a hard and extraordinary struggle, and wrote a magnificent epic of overwhelming courage. Secondly, we have declined and fallen, which specifically refers to the modern era.

context:
### Idiom: 实逼处此
### Meaning: 指为情势所迫，不得不这样。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 要准备好接班人。如果不开，说了话不算数，岂不贻笑千古吗？这叫做骑虎难下，实逼处此，欲罢不能，自己设了陷阱自己滚下去，落得个一命呜呼。
target: Prepare a successor. If you don't open up, and don't keep your word, wouldn't that be a laughingstock for ages? This is called "riding a tiger and finding it hard to get off", being forced into a corner, wanting to stop but can't, setting a trap for yourself and falling into it, ending up in a tragic fate.

context:
### Idiom: 昏迷不省
### Meaning: 神志昏沉，不省人事。同昏迷不醒”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 至中午12时许，卫生署人员到场接走老翁，送他返回蓝田寓所继续接受家居隔离。2022年1月4日，清平楼一名女户主返回住所后，发现22岁女儿房间上锁，其后强行人房后发现已经昏迷不省人事。。而救护员亦在房间内发现另一名20岁已经失去知觉的女子，经检查后，证实两名女子当场身亡。
target: At noon, the health department staff arrived to take away the elderly and send him back to his residence in Longtian for home quarantine. On January 4, 2022, the owner of Qingping Building returned to her residence after returning home and found that her 22-year-old daughter's room was locked. After forcing his way into the room, he found that the 20-year-old had lost consciousness. The paramedics also found another 20-year-old who had lost consciousness in the room, and confirmed that the two girls died on the spot after inspection.

context:
### Idiom: 不知所云
### Meaning: 《文选·诸葛亮〈出师表〉》：“临表涕泣，不知所云。”《三国志·蜀志·诸葛亮传》作“不知所言”。本为谦词，谓自己思绪紊乱，不知道说了些什么。今泛指言语混乱或空洞。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 他的哥哥贝拉是阜姆海事学院的学生，就职典礼前两个月，在一场军事演习中遭遇致命事故，米克洛什不顾家人反对，接替哥哥的名额 ，612 名申请者中，只有 42 人被学院录取，其中包括霍尔蒂。三分之一的学生不及格或退学是该学院严谨的特征[需要解释不知所云]。就学期间，他从水手学会义大利与克罗埃西亚语，他还会说德语、英语和法语 他开始在配备辅助蒸汽机的三桅帆船护卫舰Radetzky上服役。
target: His brother Béla is a student at the Fiume Maritime Academy. Two months before the commencement ceremony, he was involved in a fatal accident during a military exercise. Miklós ignored the objections of his family and took his brother's place, becoming one of the 42 students out of 612 applicants who were accepted into the academy, including Holti. One-third of the students failing or dropping out is a strict characteristic of the academy. During his studies, he learned Italian and Croatian as a sailor. He can also speak German, English, and French. He began serving on the three-masted sailing ship frigate Radetzky with auxiliary steam engines.

context:
### Idiom: 生吞活剥
### Meaning: ①比喻生硬地抄袭或模仿。语本唐刘肃《大唐新语·谐谑》：“李义府尝赋诗曰：‘镂月成歌扇，裁云作舞衣。自怜回雪影，好取洛川归。’有枣强尉张怀庆好偷名士文章，乃为诗曰：‘生情镂月成歌扇，出意裁云作舞衣。照镜自怜回雪影，时来好取洛川归。’人谓之谚曰：‘活剥王昌龄，生吞郭正一。’”②谓不加烹调。③比喻侵略欺凌。④又作：生拉硬扯。⑤比喻一知半解。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 近日大陆山东威海一处动物园上演惊恐一幕，有民众亲眼目睹栅栏中白虎将一只孔雀‘生吞活剥’吃掉，地上满是羽毛，吓坏现场一票游客，对此园方表示园内散养上千只孔雀，可能不小心误闯，老虎吃孔雀是首次发生，但看见了也没法让老虎松口。游客王女士向《河北日报》表示，8日前往西霞口神雕山野生动物世界游玩，先是看到白虎旁散落一地孔雀羽毛，再定睛仔细瞧，赫然发现老虎正在撕咬孔雀，这才拿起手机拍下过程，直击整只孔雀被活生生吃掉，让她惊呼是‘真正的野生动物园’。
target: Recently, a terrifying scene occurred in a zoo in Weihai, Shandong, in the mainland. A citizen witnessed a scene in which a white tiger ate a peacock. The ground was full of feathers and frightened all the tourists. The zoo said that there were more than a thousand peacocks in the zoo, and the white tiger might have mistakenly entered the enclosure. This is the first time that the white tiger has eaten the peacock, but it can't let the white tiger go, because the peacock was eaten alive. Wang Xiaojing, a tourist, told the Hebei Daily that on August 8, she went to the Shanhaiguan Shengxiang Mountain Wild Animal World to travel. She first saw feathers scattered everywhere near the white tiger, and then looked carefully to find that the white tiger was tearing and biting the peacock. She took out her mobile phone and took a picture of the process, and captured the peacock being eaten alive, which made her exclaim that it was a "real wild animal zoo".

context:
### Idiom: 无官一身轻
### Meaning: 不做官了，感到一身轻松。封建官僚官以后常用这句话来自我安慰。现也泛指卸去责任后一时感到轻松。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 保诚称经内部调查，决定终止与其合约，并称公司有清晰的“社交媒体指引”，员工及理财顾问应当遵守。林作回覆传媒确认消息，称由公司最高层致电通知，未提及原因，估计因为网民攻击公司，故在舆轮压力下作此决定，又称自己“无官一身轻”。港大临床医学院精神医学系讲座教授陈友凯批评精神科患者需要排期约55至95星期（至少一年或以上），有关情况不可接受，指长时间的等待容易令病情恶化，从而导致悲剧。
target: Prudential said it decided to terminate its contract after an internal investigation, adding that the company has clear "social media guidelines" that employees and financial advisors should abide by. Lin Zuo responded to the media to confirm the news, saying that he was notified by phone from the company's top management. He did not mention the reason. It is estimated that the decision was made under the pressure of public opinion because netizens attacked the company. He also said that he "has no official position and is lighthearted." Chan You-kai, Chair Professor of the Department of Psychiatry, School of Clinical Medicine, HKU, criticized the need for psychiatric patients to wait for about 55 to 95 weeks (at least one year or more). The situation is unacceptable, saying that long waiting can easily worsen the condition and lead to tragedy.

context:
### Idiom: 邪魔歪道
### Meaning: 指不正当的言行或途径。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 故事世界观：地震、万物皆有灵。日本在文化上来说，可以说是一个充满神灵的国度，根据CHEAP的影片中分享的，过去的中国也曾有许多关于妖怪或神灵的小说或纪载，像是山海经、聊斋等等纪载神灵的书，但因为中国这块神州大地上，自古就是中央集权的体制，一定要展现出主流体制打赢邪魔歪道的故事，导致中国的妖怪常常被绑手绑脚，最后只能被传统社会主流的一方击败或收服，比方说西游记没有妖怪打得赢孙悟空。但是日本的妖怪文化就不同了，因为日本是一个好山好水好无聊......欸不是，是山川水源树林茂密，地震和火山等有各种大自然灾害的国家，所以自古就对大自然充满著敬畏，认为万物皆有灵，石头都可以加以敬拜。
target: Story worldview: Earthquakes, all things have spirits. Japan, in terms of culture, can be considered a country full of gods and spirits. According to the film shared by CHEAP, in the past, China also had many novels or records about demons or spirits, such as the Classic of Mountains and Seas and the Liao Zhai Records, but in China, since ancient times, there has been a centralized system, which must show the story of the mainstream system defeating the evil forces, leading to the Chinese demons being restricted, and finally being defeated or subdued by the side of the traditional mainstream society. For example, in the Journey to the West, no demon can defeat Sun Wukong. However, the Japanese demon culture is different, as Japan is a country with lush mountains, rivers, waters, and forests, where earthquakes and volcanoes cause various natural disasters. Therefore, since ancient times, Japan has been full of reverence for nature and believes that all things have spirits, even stones can be worshiped.

context:
### Idiom: 打肿脸充胖子
### Meaning: 比喻宁可付出代价而硬充作了不起。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 花钱海派，有点打肿脸充胖子的味道，所幸贵人运不错，不至于两手空空。
target: Spending money extravagantly has a hint of trying to inflate one's face to make oneself look fat, but fortunately, one's luck in attracting good people is not bad, so one will not end up with nothing in their hands.

context:
### Idiom: 文不加点
### Meaning: 点涂上一点，表示删去。文章一气呵成，无须修改。形容文思敏捷，写作技巧纯熟。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 这不，北齐皇帝高洋命他组班子，修订法规《麟趾格》，班子里有著名作家魏收。魏收不一般，诗词歌赋，一挥而就，文不加点。李浑却有些看不起他，“法规修订小组”成立时，李浑对魏收说：“雕虫小技，我不如卿；国典朝章，卿不如我。
target: This is when the king of the Southern China, Cao Pi, ordered him to compose a committee to revise the regulations of the 'Lingzhi Digest', which included the famous poet Wei Shao. Wei Shao was not ordinary, his poems were written in one hand, without adding anything. Li Hūn was a little jealous of him, when the 'Regulations Rewriting Committee' was formed, Li Hūn said to Wei Shao: "In painting, I am inferior to you; in political regulations, you are inferior to me."

context:
### Idiom: 碌碌无奇
### Meaning: 平凡，无特殊才能。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 2023年1月，《血之辙》的实体与电子单行本合计销售量突破200万。主人公长部静一是一位碌碌无奇的普通中二生，尽管表面上与其母亲静子的关系很好，但后者明显对其儿子保护过度。暑假期间，长部家和亲戚一起去爬山。
target: In January 2023, Blood Trail's physical and electronic sales exceeded 200 million. The protagonist, Saito Haruba, is a dull secondary school student, who appears to have a good relationship with his mother, Saki, but the latter is clearly overprotecting him. During the summer, Haruba's family and relatives went hiking.

context:
### Idiom: 神不知鬼不觉
### Meaning: 指形迹隐秘，不为人知。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 天天迟到早退，下午准备打两把游戏，游戏还没开我就给旁边人说，等一会儿老师来了直接把我抓住，结果刚开一分钟，老师埋着轻巧的步伐，神不知鬼不觉的进来了，我......。
target: I arrived late and left early every day. I was going to play two games in the afternoon. Before the game started, I told the person next to me that the teacher would come and catch me soon. However, just one minute after the game started, the teacher was walking lightly, and he didn't know what was going on. Feeling came in, I...
